fi.tamk.tiko.androidpaint

Class PaintView

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • fi.tamk.tiko.androidpaint.PaintView

  • public class PaintView
extends View
    Class that is used in MainActivity to draw all the lines and shapes. Contains lists of saved lines and shapes, along with information of current brush size, style and color.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BRUSH_SIZE
      The original size of the brush.
      static int DEFAULT_BG_COLOR
      The default color of the background.
      static int DEFAULT_COLOR
      The default color of the brush.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void blur()
      Adds blur effect to brush.
      void changeStrokeShape()
      Changes the brush shape between round and square.
      void clear()
      Clears the PaintView by setting colors to original, clearing all drawn lines and shapes, and creating new bitmaps and canvas in stead of the old ones.

      Adds emboss effect to brush.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(DisplayMetrics metrics)
        Initializes bitmap size, creates bitmaps and canvas, and sets color and brush size.
        Parameters:
        metrics - Object that contains size of the display.

      • normal

        public void normal()
        Removes emboss and blur effects from brush.

      • emboss

        public void emboss()
        Adds emboss effect to brush.

      • blur

        public void blur()
        Adds blur effect to brush.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the PaintView by setting colors to original, clearing all drawn lines and shapes, and creating new bitmaps and canvas in stead of the old ones.

      • undoLine

        public void undoLine()
        Removes last drawn line. If no lines are in the list, does nothing.

      • undoShape

        public void undoShape()
        Removes last drawn shape. If no shapes are in the list, does nothing.

      • onDraw

        protected void onDraw(Canvas canvas)
        Draws all lines, shapes and bitmaps on canvas.
        Parameters:
        canvas - Canvas that the bitmaps are drawn on.

      • onTouchEvent

        public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent event)
        Determines what the app should do with each touch event. It will either draw a line, draw a shape or use the dropper tool to get color of touched pixel.
        Parameters:
        event - The MotionEvent that the user did.
        Returns:
        Whether the event was handled or not.

      • changeStrokeShape

        public void changeStrokeShape()
        Changes the brush shape between round and square.

      • shapeDraw

        public void shapeDraw(MotionEvent event)
        Draws a shape depending on which boolean is active.
        Parameters:
        event - The MotionEvent that the user did.

      • loadBitmap

        public void loadBitmap(Bitmap bmp)
        Inserts given bitmap to the loadedBitmap attribute and makes mCanvas use loadedBitmap for drawing.
        Parameters:
        bmp - Bitmap to be added to loadedBitmap.

      • getCurrentColor

        public int getCurrentColor()
        Returns:
        The current color of the brush.

      • setCurrentColor

        public void setCurrentColor(int currentColor)
        Parameters:
        currentColor - Color that is set to brush.

      • getBackgroundColor

        public int getBackgroundColor()
        Returns:
        The current color of the background.

      • setBackgroundColor

        public void setBackgroundColor(int backgroundColor)
        Parameters:
        backgroundColor - Color that is set to background.

        public void setDropperActive(boolean dropperActive)
        Parameters:
        dropperActive - Whether the dropper tool will be active.

      • setDrawRectangle

        public void setDrawRectangle(boolean drawRectangle)
        Parameters:
        drawRectangle - Whether the next stroke will draw a rectangle.

      • setDrawCircle

        public void setDrawCircle(boolean drawCircle)
        Parameters:
        drawCircle - Whether the next stroke will draw a circle.

      • setDrawLine

        public void setDrawLine(boolean drawLine)
        Parameters:
        drawLine - Whether the next stroke will draw a line.

      • setDrawOval

        public void setDrawOval(boolean drawOval)

      • setDrawRoundedRectangle

        public void setDrawRoundedRectangle(boolean drawRoundedRectangle)
        Parameters:
        drawRoundedRectangle - Whether the next stroke will draw a round-cornered rectangle.

      • setStrokeWidth

        public void setStrokeWidth(int strokeWidth)
        Parameters:
